Package com.fastasyncworldedit.core.math.random

Class Linear3DRandom

java.lang.Object
com.fastasyncworldedit.core.math.random.Linear3DRandom
All Implemented Interfaces:
SimpleRandom
public class Linear3DRandom extends Object implements SimpleRandom
A SimpleRandom that deterministically maps coordinates to values.
Since:
2.9.2

  • Constructor Details

    • Linear3DRandom

      public Linear3DRandom(int xScale, int yScale, int zScale)
      Creates a new Linear3DRandom instance
      Parameters:
      xScale - the scale applied to the x component of a coordinate
      yScale - the scale applied to the y component of a coordinate
      zScale - the scale applied to the z component of a coordinate

  • Method Details

    • nextDouble

      public double nextDouble(int x, int y, int z)
      Description copied from interface: SimpleRandom
      Generate a random double from three integer components. The generated value is between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive).
      Specified by:
      nextDouble in interface SimpleRandom
      Parameters:
      x - the first component
      y - the second component
      z - the third component
      Returns:
      a double between 0 (inclusive) and 1 (exclusive)

      x - the first component
